briefTitle: BOTOX® Open-Label Treatment in Pediatric Lower Limb Spasticity
officialTitle: BOTOX® Treatment in Pediatric Lower Limb Spasticity: Open-label Study
summary: This study will evaluate the long-term safety of BOTOX® (botulinum toxin Type A) for the treatment of pediatric lower limb spasticity.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With at Least One Treatment-emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: From first dose of study drug up to 12 weeks post last dose (Up to 60 weeks)
